bestPractices: Use engaging hooks in first tweet
Break complex topics into thread format
Include key takeaways as bullet points
Ask engaging questions to drive comments
Include demo link with clear value proposition
Include code snippets and architecture diagrams
Include canonical URL to original post
Include front matter with proper tags
Use code blocks with syntax highlighting

longTail: how to build RAG system with Bedrock
